casebody.data:
In re D.L.W., D.L.N.W., V.A.W. No. 252PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 9, 2015. Jeffrey William Gillette, for Wade, Marisha Nicole. Jamie L. Hamlett, for Alamance County DSS. Derrick J. Hensley, for D.L.W., et al. Dammien Worth, for Worth, Dammien Lamar. Kathleen Arundell Jackson, Charlotte, for N.C. Association of Department of Social Services Attorneys. Rachael J. Hawes, for N.C. Association of Department of Social Services Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of December 2015 by NC Association of Department of Social Services Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of December 2015."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
